foreignData.flavorText: "Mira più in alto la prossima volta."
foreignData.name: Scudomante Gufide

name: Owlin Shieldmage
originalText:
Flying
Ward—
Pay 3 life. (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays 3 life.)

rulings.text: If a player casts a spell that targets multiple permanents their opponent controls with ward, each of those ward abilities will trigger. If that player doesn’t pay for all of them, the spell will be countered.
